alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lafayette, Green and southwestern Rock Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanchardville, or 13 miles northeast of Darlington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Orfordville, Monticello, Albany, Argyle, Blanchardville, Footville, Newark, Wiota, Magnolia, South Wayne, Lamont, Browntown, Hanover, Juda, Avon, Jordan Center, Yellowstone Lake St Park and Woodford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
